languages.text: "Потому же, почему врут все. Я предпочитаю нравиться людям, привлекать их, а не отталкивать".
"For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."
languages.original_text: "Потому же, почему врут все. Я предпочитаю нравиться людям, привлекать их, а не отталкивать".

traits.locale_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Por la misma razón por la que cualquier otra persona miente. Porque quiero gustarle a la gente. Quiero atraerla, no repelerla».
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: «Por la misma razón por la que cualquier otra persona miente. Porque quiero gustarle a la gente. Quiero atraerla, no repelerla».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “和所有人撒谎的理由一样。我希望人们喜欢我，我想将他们引到身边，而不是将他们推开。”
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: “和所有人撒谎的理由一样。我希望人们喜欢我，我想将他们引到身边，而不是将他们推开。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「嘘をつく理由はみんな同じさ。みんなに好かれたいんだ。追い払うんじゃなく、惹きつけたいんだよ」
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘をつく理由はみんな同じさ。みんなに好かれたいんだ。追い払うんじゃなく、惹きつけたいんだよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pour quelle raison est-on amené à mentir, à votre avis ? Je veux que les gens m'aiment. Je veux les attirer à moi, et non les repousser. »
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: « Pour quelle raison est-on amené à mentir, à votre avis ? Je veux que les gens m'aiment. Je veux les attirer à moi, et non les repousser. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aus demselben Grund, aus dem alle lügen. Ich will, dass man mich mag. Ich will die Leute anziehen, nicht abstoßen."
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: "Aus demselben Grund, aus dem alle lügen. Ich will, dass man mich mag. Ich will die Leute anziehen, nicht abstoßen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

languages.text: "Neden yalan söyleriz? İnsanlar beni sevsin isterim. Onları itmek değil, çekmek isterim."
languages.original_text: "For the same reason that anybody lies. I want people to like me. I want to attract them, not repel them."

traits.locale_text: "Kişi neden yalan söyler? İnsanlar beni sevsin isterim. Onları çekmek isterim, itmek değil."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
